title: Broken Wings
description: Patrick Hawkins thought he had good reasons to leave his lover Brad Wilde and return to Ontarioâ€•but as soon as his plane touches down he starts to rethink his entire plan. Patrick's unhappy, his friends are desperate, and Brad? Not even a new job and new friends can make Brad think this split is a good idea. At first, the two of them think that a long-distance relationship might not be so bad, but things have a way of getting complicated. As their lives start to fall apart and their hearts get lonelier, it seems the only way these two lovers can fix their broken wings is if one flies back home to the other.
author: Bethany Brown
